secondSection.first: I’m Nicolás Zarcero, a really passionate and motivated student raised in Catalonia, Spain.
secondSection.second: I fell in love with technology the very first day that I got my hands on a computer and have been learning and improving new skills ever since.
secondSection.third: I’m currently studying a vocational training in microcomputing and networking systems.
secondSection.fourth: When I’m not working on any project, I like listening to music or watching movies.

first-project.title: Flora Landing Page
first-project.second-desc: features aswell as to give people an easy way to add the bot to their servers.

second-project.title: Swillan
second-project.description: A login-free courses platform. For both beginner and advanced developers who want to start their programming career or enhance it with the help of our courses.

third-project.title: Zarcero's Portfolio
third-project.description: A website made to showcase my work and let others reach out to me.
